text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Fua～aaaah… Mornin'～

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sei-chan, good morning! You look sleepy again today, though I guess you're always sleepy.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: It seems like you slipped in something rude at the end there though… Well, it's because it's been getting warmer lately, you see～.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Lately training has really left me worn out, so at night I'm out like a light.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Earlier in the dressing room by the baths, I fell asleep after stepping on to the scale, and everyone saw how much I weighed…

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: That's quite a skillful way to get some sleep, huh…
At long last, I'm baaaaack―!!
Hey everyone, it's been a while!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eh…? Oh-Oh?! Tsuru-chan?!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi has returned!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ooooh～ It's been a while～! So starting today, you're going to be attending again.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Isn't that great, Tsuru-chan?! Are you feeling better now?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Of course, I'm all good! I got a good long rest so I've got a lot of power saved up!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Just because it's saved up, don't push yourself okay? After all, before you took that break―

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Uuuu… even though everyone else has already had their debut race, I'm now the only one that hasn't run in a race yet…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It can't be helped though, your body's been in bad shape… from now on let's do our best!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, you're right! After all that time lost, I need to catch up to everyone!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Besides, the once-in-a-lifetime chance to run in the Classic races is coming up! Just like President Rudolf, I want to shine as an Uma Musume on that big stage!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Let's all run together in the Classic races!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, thank you! Alright, it's a promise, okay?! Tsuyoshi, will absolutely do her best!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: You're still recovering, so don't push yourself too hard～

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I'll be fine～! It's more like I've got more power than I know what to do with～!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Ze～… haa～…! Ze～… haa～…!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Fuhii～… I'm all… tapped out… I can't go any further～… flop.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ueeee～?! Tsuru-chan?!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Something like that… did happen didn't it?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Before the Classic races started, I was somehow able to make it back in time but, in the end, my debut race ended up being after the [Satsuki Sho] will be over.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Tsuru-chan…

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: But, but, but! The Classic races, the [Derby] and [Kika Sho], are still an option!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: I'll definitely catch up to you so, both of you, do your best at [Satsuki Sho]!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I'll be sure to work hard enough so I won't lose to Tsuru-chan! Allllright, after today's training I think I'll do some independent training!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: …Really, you're always doing your best, aren't you～, Spe-chan?
―Alright, it's done Sky!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Unyuu…?

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry, sorry, I guess you were asleep.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: …For some reason, Gramps always smells like the sun, so whenever I'm near you I start feeling sleepy, I can't help it.

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: Haa Haa Haa! Is that right, I smell like the sun! That aside, Sky, the lure's done!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Uwaa! Thanks, Gramps!! Hey hey, let's head to the river now!

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: C'mon now, the sun's already setting, you know? It can be dangerous at night, so we can go fishing tomorrow, okay?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeh～… but I want to try out Gramps' lure though…

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: One of the basics of fishing is to never lose your cool.

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: It's the same with running.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The same as running…?

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: For example, even if your friends are faster than you now, if you stay cool and steady, and keep working hard at your own pace, it'll all be fine!

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: You see, Gramps' dream is that when Sky grows up, I'll get the chance to see you run in a Classic race!

text_block_list.name: Sky's Grandpa
text_block_list.text: And if that happens, and I get to see you win, you have no idea how happy that'll make me-

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: …Oops, guess I dozed off for too long.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ah～ahh, the sun's already setting isn't it? It's your fault because the weather was too good, Mr. Sun.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The return trip's 60km… I wonder if I'll make it before curfew～

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Soon the curtain will rise, on the first leg of the Triple Crown, the Classic race, [Satsuki Sho].

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The favorite is Special Week! Following that, Seiun Sky and King Halo, the top 3 contenders, round out the popularity rankings!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: And so, the Uma Musume slowly make their way from the paddock, one step at a time, as if basking in the feeling as they approach the course of this grand stage!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Among those called the "Golden Generation", which Uma Musume will be the one to take hold of glory and claim victory?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Focus, focus… the course is the same as the [Yayoi Sho] so, this time too, for sure…!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Oh man～ it's finally here, a Classic race.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: There's so many fans so, the excitement in the air… it's on another level from any race up until now…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: But, it's the first race of the Triple Crown! I definitely have to win it!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Ooh, you're really fired up, aren't ya～?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Now that I think about it, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― is the dream left to you by your Moms, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, it was entrusted to me by both of my Moms so it's a really important dream!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: A dream entrusted to you, huh… to tell the truth, I have one too. A dream entrusted to me.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Sei-chan has one too…?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Gramps is really looking forward to it, you know～, seeing me as I win a Classic race.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: So that's how it is! In that case, just like me, Sei-chan has her Grandpa's dream that she's working hard for!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Well no～, that's a little off. It's true that I'm carrying Gramps' expecations, but you see-

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The reason I run, in the end, it's for my own sake. That's why it's a little different from Spe-chan's, I guess.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Eh?

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Even if Gramps had said it was fine if I didn't want to run, I would still run.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: If you can't understand that difference, then I'll be the one who's definitely going to win.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: The [Satsuki Sho]…I will win, without fail.

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Or something like that～. Nihihi, well then, see ya out there～

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The difference between Sei-chan and me…?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Unexpectedly, advancing from second place is Seiun Sky! From the final corner, she enters a spurt!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: In the lead is Seiun Sky! Following her is King Halo! From wide outside, Special Week is moving up!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Haaa…! Haaa…!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: …Just a little more! Keep going… Keep goooooing～!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: But it's Seiun Sky! Seiun Sky!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Seiun Sky keeps the lead and crosses the goooooal!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: In a spectacular end to the first leg of the Triple Crown, Seiun Sky claims victory!
